name: REDTHEHORSE
description: Red The Horse! Representing the dynamism and agility of the cryptocurrency trading space, Red the Horse stands as a symbol of speed, strength, and endurance.

tokenomics.buyAndSellFees: A nominal fee of 2% is applied on both buying and selling transactions to support the token's ecosystem.
tokenomics.swapMechanism: Fees accumulated in the contract are swapped, typically for ETH, once they reach 0.02% of the total supply.

features.speedAndAgility: Embodying the spirit of a horse, the RTH token promises rapid transactions and lightning-fast transfers, making it an ideal choice for quick decentralized finance (DeFi) operations.
features.communityFocus: With an emphasis on community involvement and growth, Red the Horse is not only a cryptocurrency but also a movement.
